text:
Mission is a city in Johnson County, Kansas, United States. It is part of the Kansas City Metropolitan Area. In 2010, 9,323 lived there.
Geography.
Mission is at (39.025572, -94.656056). The United States Census Bureau says that the city has a total area of. Of that, is land and is water.
2010 census.
The 2010 census says there were 9,323 people, 5,000 households, and 2,130 families living in Mission.
